testcase.name: Getir basket test
testcase.system-out: Given The user open the getir application and enters "hello@getir.com" and "hello".passed Then The user login successfully............................................passed And The user verify that basket is empty and able to see "There is no result".passed And The user able to see all menu list in console and verify that ise size is 12.passed And The user clicks second category which is "Atıştırmalık".................passed And The user add two items..................................................passed And The user scroll down to "Ürün 13".......................................passed And The user add two items..................................................passed And The user go to basket...................................................passed Then The user verify that "Total Amount : 84 ₺".............................passed
